name: Thok-Ro
description:
Purposeful Industry
The Thok-Ro are an orcish culture of loyalty and perseverance to a greater cause. They value industry, perfection in craft, and have long since abandoned worship of the gods.

options.name: Reaction: Industrial Efficiency
options.description: When you successfully craft an item, you can immediately begin crafting another item of the same type with a +1d4 bonus to the crafting check.

options.name: Purposeful Presence
options.description: Gain +1 Presence and your dedication to your cause inspires others to work harder.

options.name: Master Craftsman
options.description: Gain +1 Engineering and items you craft require 25% less materials.
